name: rude
description: This is one of the drawings that I use for my portraits with pencil and conte. In these drawing, I like to achieve the darkness and lightness of portraits in a short time with fast lines, and with the contrast that arises, I can study the overall mass of the portrait. In this type of fast drawing, variety of lines, different directions and scattering of darkness and light, create very good effect in the portrait or still life.
